properties.areaDesc: Coastal Waters from Montauk NY to Marthas Vineyard extending out to 20 nm South of Block Island
properties.headline: Gale Warning issued January 7 at 3:53AM EST until January 9 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Boston/Norton MA
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Gale Warning Wednesday, northwest winds 20 to 30
kt with gusts up to 35 kt and seas 6 to 11 feet expected. For
the Small Craft Advisory today, west winds 10 to 20 kt with
gusts up to 30 kt and seas 4 to 7 feet.

* WHERE...Coastal Waters from Montauk NY to Marthas Vineyard
extending out to 20 nm South of Block Island.

* WHEN...For the Gale Warning, from 1 PM Wednesday to 7 AM EST
Thursday. For the Small Craft Advisory, until 11 AM EST this
morning.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will cause hazardous seas which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM EST THIS MORNING... ...GALE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM WEDNESDAY TO 7 AM EST THURSDAY
